title: Breathing Out And Breathing In
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c v5 c v6 c v7 c

v1: O Lord, breathe Thy Spirit on me,
Teach me how to breath Thee in;
Help me pour into Thy bosom
All my life of self and sin.
v2: I am breathing out my own life,
That I may be filled with Thine;
Letting go my strength and weakness,
v3: Thou hast borne it all for me;
Finding all my life in Thee.
v4: I am breathing out my sorrow,
On Thy kind and gentle breast;
Breathing in Thy joy and comfort,
Breathing in Thy peace and rest.
v5: I am breathing out my sickness,
Thou hast borne its burden too;
I am breathing in Thy healing,
v6: I am breathing out my longings
I am breathing in Thy answers,
v7: Drawing all my life from Thee;
Breath by breath I live upon Thee,
c1: I am breathing out my sorrow,
